Title: B.S.O.D.
Writer: Jonathan Nolan (created by), Greg Plageman, Tony Camerino, Lucas O'Connor (executive story editor), Tony Camerino (story editor)
Actors: Jim Caviezel, Kevin Chapman, Amy Acker, Michael Emerson
Plot: Lionel is investigated in relation to Dominic's death. Away from Samaritan, Mr. Reese and Harold try to save the Machine. Root is on the run.
